mapper.sql: id, field_english_name, field_chinese_name, table_id, datasource_id, field_type, field_length, isterm
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from ds_field_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ds_field_info (id, field_english_name, field_chinese_name, table_id, datasource_id, field_type, field_length, isterm) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isterm,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
field_english_name = #{record.fieldEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_chinese_name = #{record.fieldChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

field_english_name = #{fieldEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_chinese_name = #{fieldChineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datasource_id = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

field_length = #{fieldLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isterm = #{isterm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_field_info( datasource_id, table_id, field_english_name, field_type, field_length )VALUES
( #{list.datasource_id}, #{list.table_id}, #{list.field_english_name}, #{list.field_type}, #{list.field_length} )
mapper.select:
SELECT CONCAT(table_id,'.',field_english_name) as 'key', id as 'value' FROM ds_field_info WHERE table_id IN
#{list.table_id}
select id, field_english_name as name from ds_field_info where table_id = #{id} and datasource_id =#{datasource_id} and state = 0
